plot: Barbara Newhart is young, beautiful and full of compassion. She takes a job as a caregiver for an elderly man named Edgar. A job unlike any she has had before. Nothing can prepare her for the terror that awaits her.
title: The Caregiver
plot_es: Barbara Newhart is young, beautiful and full of compassion. She takes a job as a caregiver for an elderly man named Edgar. A job unlike any she has had before. Nothing can prepare her for the terror that awaits her.
plot_en: Barbara Newhart is young, beautiful and full of compassion. She takes a job as a caregiver for an elderly man named Edgar. A job unlike any she has had before. Nothing can prepare her for the terror that awaits her.
